title: Switch MiningHub PDF content to Hindi and add crypto mining explainer section

requirements.text: Change the MiningHub investment plan PDF content language from English to Hindi by updating all user-visible headings, labels, paragraphs, and footer strings in the PDF output (including sections such as About, What We Do, Benefits, Investment Package, Referral System, Level Income, Team Rewards, Deposit & Withdrawal, and Income Calculator).
acceptanceCriteria: Generating and downloading the PDF produces a document where all section titles and descriptive text are in Hindi (numbers/currency values may remain numeric like $20, $0.60).
No English-only headings remain in the PDF (e.g., 'About MiningHub', 'Investment Package', 'Referral System', 'Generated from MiningHub Investment Plan').
The PDF generation completes successfully with the existing layout and does not throw runtime errors.

requirements.text: Add a new section to the MiningHub plan PDF that explains what crypto mining is and how it works, with the section content written in Hindi and placed as a dedicated, clearly titled section in the PDF.

quotes: Aur crypto mining kya hota hai kaise hota hai ye bhi add karo

acceptanceCriteria: The generated PDF includes a clearly labeled Hindi section explaining (1) what crypto mining is and (2) how it works at a high level (e.g., verification/consensus, hashing, rewards), written as readable paragraphs and/or bullet points.
The new section is included in the PDF consistently on every generation and respects page-break handling (no overlapping text; it flows onto a new page if needed).
The new sectionâ€™s Hindi content is maintained as part of the single source of truth plan content (not scattered hard-coded across multiple components).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components only).
Do not modify immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts).
Backend remains a single-actor Motoko canister; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new backend storage, admin panels, or dynamic CMS editing for plan text.
Changing or adding additional investment packages beyond the existing single $20 package.
Adding new authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
